reviewText: What can I say? A must-see for all Warren Ellis fans. But also for musicians. And journalists. Anyone who wants to live life with integrity. It's great.
I'm a fan of his writing. Funny documentary about a very great writer. Enjoy his prose and how he adds his own take to the superhero genre.
If you'd like to see how Warren Ellis thinks/works.  This is your movie.
Great for Ellis fans -- will get you interested in this unique writer if you are not already.
This is a great documentary for any fan of Warren Ellis, his work or even his twitter feed. Behold, the Internet Messiah!

I loved this movie.  Interesting look into the mind of one of my favorite comics writers... actually now just one of my favorite writers.  Not to be taken too seriously, not too heavy handed.  Just a light look at the workings and process of the man.  Lots that I didn't know, but piqued my curiosity even more.  Plus lots of interviews with many other comic creators.  I'm not sure how this would play with the non comics fan, but I like it.
Warren Ellis got me into comics. This is an awesome documentary by the makers of the Alan Moore and the Grant Morrison documentary
A must watch for any Ellis fan. Interesting and full of insight. Captured Ghosts continues to expand on Ellis' mystique.
